question: One of your colleagues was in charge of organizing an annual executive conference, and he/she has been successful in doing it. You want to congratulate your colleague on that.Write a letter to this colleague. In your letter,•	congratulate your colleague for successfully organizing the event•	mention what you liked about it the most•	say how much you would like him/her to organize other events as well
text: I hope you are well. I am writing this letter to congratulate you on the perfect job you have performed in organizing the Latin American Annual Conference.

I think you might know that I have been working at Willis Company for almost a decade, thus I’ve participated in more than 9 events. However, I do not remember  attending such a pleasant conference. From my perspective, the most memorable moment was the lecture about leadership given by James Hodge. When they talked over, I could see that everyone are delighted and motivated to accomplish the companies goal with the team.

I am pleased to invite you to be responsible for carrying all the companies’ events from now on. I have already talked to our CEO Priscila Ali, who agreed that you deserve a promotion, not only financially but also in your career.
I would like to hear from you if you accepted this new challenge.
